subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia Phillies placed the left-hander Cliff Lee on the 15-day disabled list with an elbow strain Friday. Lee left in the third inning of Thursday night's win over Washington.
snippet: The Philadelphia Phillies placed the left-hander Cliff Lee on the 15-day disabled list with an elbow strain Friday. Lee left in the third inning of Thursday night's win over Washington.
